# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to both parties, with its worth being $12,000 to you and similarly to me. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose we come to a mutually beneficial agreement. To ensure we reach an understanding that respects the significance of this transaction, I kindly invite you to consider purchasing the product at a special introductory price of $11,500. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of fostering a long-term relationship with you. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
